::Feline::

Looks at HotRod's wounds,"WHy don't you get back to base and get into 
a CR.  I'll help here."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He falls back to Zardus' and Feline's position.
> "We almost have them turned into scrap!" He was working fine, but 
his
> outer armor looked like part of planet Junkion.
> 
> ::Demolition::
> 
> He avoided all attacks.
> "This battle is ours, yesssssss!"
